    Method
    Description
    List<IFilterConfiguration>
    Configuration.getAdditionalFilesDisplayFilters()
    Returns a regex such that all download files which filenames fit this regex should not be visible in the downloads widget.

    Classes in io.goobi.viewer.controller.config.filter that implement IFilterConfiguration
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractFilterConfiguration
    A configurable filter allowing passage to document entities (record, docStruct, page) which satisfy certain conditions.
    final class 
    ConfiguredValueFilter
    A configurable filter allowing passage to document entities (record, docStruct, page) which satisfy certain conditions The filter itself may contain condition filters which determine if the filter should be applied to an entity
    final class 
    PassedValueFilter
    A configurable filter allowing passage to document entities (record, docStruct, page) which satisfy certain conditions.
